TopicTitle: The Micro Landing Struts should not sink into the ground

Articles.Content: Every time I use the Micro Landing Struts the end circle bit always sinks into the ground. I know it's a really minor change but I think it would look much better if the circle bit stayed above ground.

Sometimes when i switch to a lander e.g. on the mun, it gets loaded, then the terrain loads and the lander starts bumping around, sometimes it even crashes. Maybe this is also caused by landing struts being into the ground?

As far as i can see to avoid collisions with the ground vehicles spawn some metres above ground and fall down. This should happen in the background but it doesnt resulting in destruction/damage of your spacecraft. I believe the small struts just have unappropriate collision boxes but this is "just" an esthetic issue and "harmless"...

Would be happy to see 0.21.2 bugfixing release.
